pages.text: In this Chapter of the book, I will show you some tools to remove Trees COMPLETLY.
But how does the Target look? Click the link below!
With Choppy you can easily remove many, many Trees from a Forest - and get the resources ot of it!

pages.title: C++ (Choppy++)
pages.text: First of all, this thing is hard to get because: 1. It erases all Logs in a 150 Block radius and 2. The Items get dropped on the ground. You have been warned.
